Text: I've been looking for this one. Thanks!
Thanks, great upload.. Anyone else having problems with those .m4v files?

VLC should play those .mkv files just fine.  Otherwise if you absolutely HAVE to play it in a certain video player, I\'m sure the codecs are a quick Bing search away.  (Google is eVil)nnI\'m gonna give myself a project pretty soon to make compressed versions of this and others that haven\'t been made yet.
Thanks! Great stuff! I took me 2d, 14h to download but its worth it!
dohduhdah, thanks for everything. You're da fxxking man!
